org.mini2Dx.miniscript.core

Interface ScriptInvocationListener


  • public interface ScriptInvocationListener
    Interface for script execution listeners. Note: All callbacks occur on a different thread from the game thread

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean callOnGameThread()
      Returns if this ScriptInvocationListener should be notified on the game thread
      void onScriptException(int scriptId, java.lang.Exception e)
      Called when an exception occurs during script execution
      void onScriptSkipped(int scriptId)
      Called when a script is skipped
      void onScriptSuccess(int scriptId, ScriptExecutionResult executionResult)
      Called when a script successfully completes

    • Method Detail

      • onScriptSuccess

        void onScriptSuccess(int scriptId,
                   ScriptExecutionResult executionResult)
        Called when a script successfully completes
        Parameters:
        scriptId - The script id
        executionResult - The variable bindings after execution

      • onScriptSkipped

        void onScriptSkipped(int scriptId)
        Called when a script is skipped
        Parameters:
        scriptId - The script id

      • onScriptException

        void onScriptException(int scriptId,
                     java.lang.Exception e)
        Called when an exception occurs during script execution
        Parameters:
        scriptId - The script id
        e - The exception that occurred

      • callOnGameThread

        boolean callOnGameThread()
        Returns if this ScriptInvocationListener should be notified on the game thread
        Returns:
        False if this should be notified on the GameScriptingEngine thread pool
